text: "Summer" is a 2014 song by Scottish DJ Calvin Harris and is the second single from his fourth studio album Motion. It topped the single charts in the Czech Republic, Finland, Ireland, Slovakia and the United Kingdom. It went to the top 5 in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Germany, Hungary, Italy, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland, South Africa, Sweden and Switzerland. It also peaked at number 19 in New Zealand. Category:2014 songs Category:Calvin Harris songs Category:Dance-pop songs Category:Electronic dance music songs
title: Summer (Calvin Harris song)
